trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> controls in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 현재 컨테이너의 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> 컨트롤 목록을 검색하는 형식 변환기를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> class and provides a type converter specifically for controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter> 클래스에서 파생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> 클래스에서 파생 되는 컨트롤에 대 한 구체적으로 형식 변환기를 제공 하 고는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada).
trans-unit.target: 형식 변환기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 형식 변환기 구현](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) 또는 [일반화 된 형식 변환](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" /> class.
**Note** You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: **참고** 는 형식 변환기를 직접 액세스 하지 마십시오.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 적절 한 변환기를 사용 하 여 호출 된 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
The control instance to test whether it is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />.
Indicates whether the provided control inherits from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="control" /> inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" />이 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> 클래스에서 상속되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter.FilterControl(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method returns <see langword="true" /> when the control is an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 구현에서 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter.FilterControl(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> 메서드 반환 <see langword="true" /> 때 컨트롤의 인스턴스가 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> 클래스.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" /> override this method to provide their own filtering mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 클래스는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" /> 고유한 필터링 메커니즘을 제공 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 합니다.
